song_lyrics: Re āvo more pāune prītam piyā prān bālam re,
Tan man karu kurabān bālam re, ṭek.
Shyām sundar more ur lapaṭāyake, karungī adhar-ras pān bālam re. āvo. 1
Man-mohan more nename rākhu, jān na deungī ān bālam re. āvo. 2
Darash paras leu sukh ālīngan, ab na sahungī me hān bālam re. āvo. 3
Premsakhī kahe sukh-sāgarso, leungī me chumban dān bālam re. āvo. 4
title: Re āvo more pāune prītam piyā prān bālam re

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-1145: Sadguru Premanand Swami

Category: Prakirna Pad
